00048 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /* USB Device descriptor setting                                                                            */
00050 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 // <h> USB Device descriptor setting
00052 //   <o0> USB Specification Release number (bcdUSB)
00053 //      <0x0200=> USB 2.0
00054 //      <0x0110=> USB 1.1
00055 //      <0x0100=> USB 1.0
00056 //   <o1> USB Class code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00057 //      <0x00=> Use class information in the Interface Descriptors (0x00)
00058 //      <0x02=> Communications and CDC Control (CDC, 0x02)
00059 //      <0xDC=> Diagnostic Device (0xDC)
00060 //      <0xEF=> Miscellaneous (0xEF)
00061 //      <0xFF=> Vendor Specific (0xFF)
00062 //   <o2> USB Subclass code (assigned by the USB-IF) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00063 //   <o3> USB Protocol code (assigned by the USB-IF) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00064 //   <o4> USB Vendor ID <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00065 //   <o5> USB Product ID <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00066 //   <o6> USB Device Version <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00067 //   <o7.0> USB String descriptor - Manufacturer
00068 //   <o8.0> USB String descriptor - Product
00069 //   <o9.0> USB String descriptor - Device serial number
00070 //   <o10> USB Number of possible configurations <0-255:1>
00071 #define DESC_BCDUSB               (0x0110)
00072 #define DESC_BDEVCLASS            (0xEF)
00073 #define DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS         (0x02)
00074 #define DESC_BDEVPROTOCOL         (0x01)
00075 #define DESC_IDVENDOR             (0x04D9)
00076 #define DESC_IDPRODUCT            (0x8008)
00077 #define DESC_BCDDEVICE            (0x0100)
00078 #define DESC_IMANUFACTURE         (1)
00079 #define DESC_IPRODUCT             (1)
00080 #define DESC_ISERIALNUM           (1)
00081 #define DESC_INUMCONFN            (1)
00082 // </h>
00083 
00084 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 /* USB Device Descriptor definition. DO NOT MODIFY.                                                         */
00086 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00087 #if (DESC_BDEVCLASS == 0x0 & DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS != 0x0)
00088 #error "DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS must be reset to zero when the DESC_BDEVCLASS is equal to zero."
00089 #endif
00090 #define DESC_WMAXPACKETSIZE0      (_EP0LEN)
00091 #define DESC_STR_MAN              (1 * DESC_IMANUFACTURE)
00092 #define DESC_STR_PRD              (2 * DESC_IPRODUCT)
00093 #define DESC_STR_SER              (3 * DESC_ISERIALNUM)
00094 #define DESC_NUM_STRING           (1 + 3)
00095 
00096 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /* USB Device descriptor                                                                                    */
00098 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_DeviceDesc[] =
00100 {
00101   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102   /* Device descriptor                                                                                      */
00103   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00104                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00105                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00106   DESC_LEN_DEV,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00107   DESC_TYPE_01_DEV,           // bDescriptorType     1 DEVICE Descriptor Type
00108   DESC_H2B(DESC_BCDUSB),      // bcdUSB              2 USB Specification Release Number
00109   DESC_BDEVCLASS,             // bDeviceClass        1 Class code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00110   DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS,          // bDeviceSubClass     1 Subclass code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00111   DESC_BDEVPROTOCOL,          // bDeviceProtocol     1 Protocol code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00112   DESC_WMAXPACKETSIZE0,       // wMaxPacketSize0     1 Maximum packet size for endpoint zero
00113   DESC_H2B(DESC_IDVENDOR),    // idVendor            2 Vendor ID (assigned by USB-IF)
00114   DESC_H2B(DESC_IDPRODUCT),   // idProduct           2 Product ID (assigned by manufacturer)
00115   DESC_H2B(DESC_BCDDEVICE),   // bcdDevice           2 Device release number
00116   DESC_STR_MAN,               // iManufacturer       1 Index of string descriptor (Manufacturer)
00117   DESC_STR_PRD,               // iProduct            1 Index of string descriptor (Product)
00118   DESC_STR_SER,               // iSerialNumber       1 Index of string descriptor (Serial Number)
00119   DESC_INUMCONFN,             // iNumConfigurations  1 Number of possible configuration
00120 };
00121 
00122 
00123 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00124 /* USB Configuration descriptor setting                                                                     */
00125 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00126 // <h> USB Configuration descriptor setting
00127 //   <o0.0> Self-powered
00128 //     <i> Bit 6 of bmAttributes
00129 //   <o1.0> Remote Wakeup
00130 //     <i> Bit 5 of bmAttributes
00131 //   <o2> USB Device maximum power (mA) < 2-512:2>
00132 #define DESC_BMATTR_SELF_POWER        (0)
00133 #define DESC_BMATTR_REMOTE_WAKEUP     (1)
00134 #define DESC_BMAXPOWER                (100)
00135 // </h>
00136 
00137 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00138 /* USB Configuration Descriptor definition. DO NOT MODIFY.                                                  */
00139 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00140 #define DESC_BMATTRIBUTES        (0x80 | (DESC_BMATTR_SELF_POWER << 6) | (DESC_BMATTR_REMOTE_WAKEUP << 5))
00141 #define DESC_TOTAL_LEN           DESC_H2B((DESC_LEN_CONFN_T + RETARGET_DLEN))
00142 
00143 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00144 /* USB Configuration Descriptor                                                                             */
00145 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00146 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_ConfnDesc[] =
00147 {
00148   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00149   /* Configuration descriptor                                                                               */
00150   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00151                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00152                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00153   DESC_LEN_CONFN,             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00154   DESC_TYPE_02_CONFN,         // bDescriptorType     1 CONFIGURATION Descriptor Type
00155   DESC_TOTAL_LEN,             // wTotalLength        2 Total length of data returned for this configuration
00156   0x02 + RETARGET_INF,        // bNumberInterface    1 Number of interfaces supported by this configuration
00157   0x01,                       // bConfigurationValue 1 Value to use as an argument to the SetConfiguration()
00158   0x00,                       // iConfiguration      1 Index of string descriptor describing this configuration
00159   DESC_BMATTRIBUTES,          // bmAttributes        1 Configuration characteristics
00160                               //                        D6: Self-powered, D5: RemoteWakeup
00161   DESC_POWER(DESC_BMAXPOWER), // bMaxPower           1 Maximum power consumption of the USB device (2 mA units)
00162 
00163   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00164   /* IAD to associate the two UAC interfaces                                                                */
00165   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00166   8,                          // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00167   11,                         // bDescriptorType     1 Descriptor Type
00168   0,                          // bFirstInterface     1
00169   2,                          // bInterfaceCount     1
00170   1,                          // bFunctionClass      1
00171   1,                          // bFunctionSubClass   1
00172   0,                          // bFunctionProtocol   1
00173   0x00,                       // iFunction           1 Index of string descriptor describing this function.
00174 
00175   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00176   /* Interface descriptor                                                                                   */
00177   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00178                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00179                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00180   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00181   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE Descriptor Type
00182   0x00,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of this interface (Zero-based 0)
00183   0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select this alternate setting
00184   0,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints used by this interface
00185   DESC_CLASS_01_AUDIO,        // bInterfaceClass     1 Class code (assigned by USB-IF)
00186   UAC_SUBCLASS_01_AUDIOCTRL,  // bInterfaceSubClass  1 Subclass code (assigned by USB-IF)
00187   UAC_PROTOCOL_00_UNDEFINED,  // bInterfaceProtocol  1 Protocol code (assigned by USB)
00188   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of string descriptor describing this interface
00189 
00190   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00191   /* Class-specific AC Interface Descriptor                                                                 */
00192   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00193                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00194                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00195   9,                          // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00196   DESC_TYPE_24_CS_INTERFACE,  // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE Descriptor type
00197   DESC_SUBTYPE_01_HEADER,     // bDescriptorSubtype  1 HEADER Descriptor type
00198   DESC_H2B(0x0100),           // bcdADC              2 Audio Device Class Specification Release Number
00199   DESC_H2B(0x0027),           // wTotalLength        2 Total number of bytes returned for this descriptor
00200   0x01,                       // bInCollection       1 Number of AudioStreaming and MIDIStreaming interfaces
00201   0x01,                       // baInterfaceNr       1 Interface number of the n interface
00202 
00203   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00204   /* Input Terminal Descriptor                                                                              */
00205   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00206                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00207                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00208   DESC_LEN_0C_UAC_IN_TERML,   // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00209   DESC_TYPE_24_CS_INTERFACE,  // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE Descriptor type
00210   DESC_SUBTYPE_02_IN_TERML,   // bDescriptorSubtype  1 INPUT_TERMINAL Descriptor type
00211   IT_ID,                      // bTerminalID         1 Constant ID of the Terminal within the audio function
00212   DESC_H2B(0x0101),           // wTerminalType       2 Constant characterizing the type of Terminal
00213   0x00,                       // bAssocTerminal      1 ID of the Output Terminal to associated with this
00214   0x01,                       // bNrChannels         1 Number of logical output channels in the Terminal¡¦s output audio channel cluster
00215   DESC_H2B(0x0000),           // wChannelConfig      2 Describes the spatial location of the logical channels
00216   0x00,                       // iChannelNames       1 Index of a string descriptor for first logic channel
00217   0x00,                       // iTerminal           1 Index of a string descriptor for the Input Terminal
00218 
00219   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00220   /* Feature Unit Descriptor                                                                                */
00221   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00222                                /* Field            Size Description                                         */
00223                                /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00224   9,                           // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00225   DESC_TYPE_24_CS_INTERFACE,   // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE Descriptor type
00226   DESC_SUBTYPE_06_FEATURE_UNIT,// bDescriptorSubtype  1 FEATURE_UNIT Descriptor type
00227   FU_ID,                       // bUnitID             1 Constant ID of the Unit within the audio function
00228   IT_ID,                       // bSourceID           1 ID of the Unit or Terminal to which this Feature Unit is connected
00229   0x01,                        // bControlSize        1 Size in bytes of an element of the bmaControls() array
00230   0x01,                        // bmaControls(0)      1 A bit set to 1 indicates that the mentioned Control is supported for master channel n
00231   0x00,                        // bmaControls(1)      1
00232   0x00,                        // iFeature            1 Index of a string descriptor for the Feature Unit
00233 
00234   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00235   /* Output Terminal Descriptor                                                                             */
00236   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00237                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00238                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00239   DESC_LEN_09_UAC_OUT_TERML,  // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00240   DESC_TYPE_24_CS_INTERFACE,  // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE Descriptor type
00241   DESC_SUBTYPE_03_OUT_TERML,  // bDescriptorSubtype  1 INPUT_TERMINAL Descriptor type
00242   OT_ID,                      // bTerminalID         1 Constant ID of the Terminal within the audio function
00243   DESC_H2B(0x0301),           // wTerminalType       2 Constant characterizing the type of Terminal
00244   0x00,                       // bAssocTerminal      1 ID of the Output Terminal to associated with this
00245   0x02,                       // bSourceID           1 ID of the Unit or Terminal to which this Terminal is connected
00246   0x00,                       // iTerminal           1 Index of a string descriptor for the Input Terminal
00247 
00248   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00249   /* Interface descriptor                                                                                   */
00250   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00251                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00252                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00253   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00254   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE Descriptor Type
00255   0x01,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of this interface (Zero-based 0)
00256   0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select this alternate setting
00257   0,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints used by this interface
00258   DESC_CLASS_01_AUDIO,        // bInterfaceClass     1 Class code (assigned by USB-IF)
00259   UAC_SUBCLASS_02_AUDIOSTREAM,// bInterfaceSubClass  1 Subclass code (assigned by USB-IF)
00260   UAC_PROTOCOL_00_UNDEFINED,  // bInterfaceProtocol  1 Protocol code (assigned by USB)
00261   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of string descriptor describing this interface
00262 
00263   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00264   /* Interface descriptor                                                                                   */
00265   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00266                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00267                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00268   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00269   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE Descriptor Type
00270   0x01,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of this interface (Zero-based 0)
00271   0x01,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select this alternate setting
00272   1,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints used by this interface
00273   DESC_CLASS_01_AUDIO,        // bInterfaceClass     1 Class code (assigned by USB-IF)
00274   UAC_SUBCLASS_02_AUDIOSTREAM,// bInterfaceSubClass  1 Subclass code (assigned by USB-IF)
00275   UAC_PROTOCOL_00_UNDEFINED,  // bInterfaceProtocol  1 Protocol code (assigned by USB)
00276   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of string descriptor describing this interface
00277 
00278   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00279   /* Audio Streaming Interface Descriptor                                                                   */
00280   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00281                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00282                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00283   DESC_LEN_07_UAC_STREAMING,  // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00284   DESC_TYPE_24_CS_INTERFACE,  // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE Descriptor type
00285   DESC_SUBTYPE_01_AS_GERERAL, // bDescriptorSubtype  1 AS_GENERAL Descriptor type
00286   0x01,                       // bTerminalLink       1 The Terminal ID of the Terminal to which the endpoint of this interface is connected
00287   0x01,                       // bDelay              1 Delay introduced by the data path
00288   DESC_H2B(0x0002),           // wFormatTag          2 The Audio Data Format that has to be used to communicate with this interface
00289 
00290   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00291   /* Audio Type I Format Interface Descriptor                                                               */
00292   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00293                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00294                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00295   0x0B,                       // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00296   DESC_TYPE_24_CS_INTERFACE,  // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE Descriptor type
00297   DESC_SUBTYPE_02_FORMAT_TYPE,// bDescriptorSubtype  1 AS_GENERAL Descriptor type
00298   0x01,                       // bFormatType         1
00299   0x02,                       // bNrChannels         1
00300   0x02,                       // bSubFrameSize       1
00301   16,                         // bBitResolution      1
00302   0x01,                       // bSamFreqType        1
00303   0x80,                       // tSamFreq            3
00304   0xBB,
00305   0x00,
00306 
00307   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00308   /* Endpoint Standard Descriptor                                                                           */
00309   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00310                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00311                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00312   DESC_LEN_09_UAC_STD_EPT,    // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00313   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00314   0x04,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00315                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00316                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00317                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00318   0x01,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00319                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00320                               //                                  00 = Control
00321                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00322                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00323                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00324                               //                        Bit 3..2: Synchronization type
00325                               //                                  01 = Asynchronous
00326                               //                                  10 = Adaptive
00327                               //                                  11 = Synchronous
00328                               //                        All other reserved
00329   DESC_H2B(_EP4LEN),          // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00330   0x01,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00331   0x00,                       // bRefresh            1 Reset to 0.
00332   0x00,                       // bSynchAddress       1 The address of the endpoint used to communicate synchronization information
00333 
00334   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00335   /* Endpoint Audio Streaming Descriptor                                                                    */
00336   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00337                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00338                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00339   DESC_LEN_07_UAC_STREAM_EPT, // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00340   DESC_TYPE_25_CS_EPT,        // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00341   DESC_SUBTYPE_01_EP_GERERAL, // bDescriptorSubtype  1 EP_GENERAL descriptor subtype.
00342   0x00,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00343   0x00,                       // bLockDelayUnits     1 Indicates the units used for the wLockDelay field
00344   0x00,                       // wLockDelay          1 Indicates the time it takes this endpoint to reliably lock its internal clock recovery circuitry.
00345   0x00,
00346 
00347   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00348     #include "ht32_retarget_desc.h"
00349   #endif
00350 
00351 };

00354 /* USB String Descriptor                                                                                    */
00355 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00356 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_StringDescLANGID[] =
00357 {
00358   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00359   /* LANGID (Index = 0)                                                                                     */
00360   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00361                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00362                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00363   DESC_STRLEN(1),             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00364   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00365   DESC_H2B(0x0409),           // wLANGID[0]          2 LANGID code zero
00366 };

00378   DESC_CHAR('H'),             // bString             N UNICODE encoded string
00379   DESC_CHAR('O'),
00380   DESC_CHAR('L'),
00381   DESC_CHAR('T'),
00382   DESC_CHAR('E'),

00398   DESC_CHAR('S'),
00399   DESC_CHAR('B'),
00400   DESC_CHAR('-'),

00440 uc8 *gpStringDesc[DESC_NUM_STRING] =
00441 {
00442 
00443   guUSB_StringDescLANGID,
00444 
00445   #if (DESC_IMANUFACTURE == 1)
00446   guUSB_StringDescManufacture,
00447   #else
00448   NULL,
00449   #endif
00450 
00451   #if (DESC_IPRODUCT == 1)
00452   guUSB_StringDescProduct,
00453   #else
00454   NULL,
00455   #endif
00456 
00457   #if (DESC_ISERIALNUM == 1)
00458   guUSB_StringDescSerialNum
00459   #else
00460   NULL,
00461   #endif
00462 
00463 };
00464 
00465 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00466   * @brief  USB Descriptor pointer initialization.
00467   * @param  pDesc: pointer of USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef
00468   * @retval None
00469   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00470 void USBDDesc_Init(USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef *pDesc)
00471 {
00472   pDesc->pDeviceDesc = guUSB_DeviceDesc;
00473   pDesc->pConfnDesc = guUSB_ConfnDesc;
00474   pDesc->ppStringDesc = gpStringDesc;
00475   pDesc->uStringDescNumber = DESC_NUM_STRING;
00476 
00477   return;
00478 }
